author: John Holman
title: Domestic abuse spikes in Mexico amid virus outbreak
description: According to authorities, at least 10 women are killed each day in Mexico, but now rights groups fear more violence amid coronavirus pandemic.
content:
In Mexico, there are concerns that there could be hidden victims of the coronavirus pandemic.
Women's rights advocates say the country has a bad track record with gender-based violence - and the outbreak is only making things worse.
